Class AvailableUsersUtil

      • sortAvailableEmployees

        public static java.util.ArrayList<UserBasicWorkHours> sortAvailableEmployees(int shiftId,
                                                                             java.time.LocalDate date)
        Sorts available employees on a shift by workhours
        Parameters:
        shiftId - - the shift that needs a new employee
        date - - the date of the shift
        Returns:
        arraylist with sorted employees by category as UserBasicWorkHours objects

      • sortAvailableEmployeesWithCategory

        public java.util.ArrayList<UserBasicWorkHours> sortAvailableEmployeesWithCategory(int shiftId,
                                                                                  java.time.LocalDate date,
                                                                                  User.UserCategory category,
                                                                                  boolean onlyThisCategory)
        Sorts available employees on a shift by workhours and category, then returns the ones with the given category first
        Parameters:
        shiftId - - the shift that needs a new employee
        date - - the date of the shift
        category - - the employee category
        onlyThisCategory - - if True, returns the list with only employees in the given category
        Returns:
        arraylist with sorted employees by category as UserBasicWorkHours objects

      • sendNotificationOfShiftChange

        public boolean sendNotificationOfShiftChange(Shift shift,
                                             User userFrom,
                                             java.sql.Timestamp dateTime)
        Finds available users for a shift and sends a notification to the qualified users
        Parameters:
        shift - - shift ID for the shift that needs a new employee
        userFrom - - the employee that originally was working on this shift
        dateTime - - the timestamp for the notification
        Returns:
        True if successful
